page.title: 03EXCELSIOR HOTEL
page.content: The Excelsior Hotel is an imposing structure nine storeys high which is situated 100 yards from the main terminal building of Glasgow Airport. The hotel has 305 rooms and two rest- aurants:the Ranfurley-which is a la carte-and the Carvery.There is also a function suite,a lounge,a bar and a hairdressers.The clients are mostly businessmen usually staying no more than two nights.Because of the hotel's situation few tourists stay here except for a few in the summer. There are 138 full-time and part - time staff in the hotel.Parking facilities are inadequate,but plans for further extension have so far been unsuccessful as the adjacent land belongs to the British Airport Author- ities.
